Title: The Damage a Man Can Do
Plot: Dexter undertakes to teach Miguel the Code, but doesn't realize he's whetting his partner's thirst for blood. Meanwhile, Debra is one step closer to finding the Skinner but a secret revealed about Anton sends him packing.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Desmond Harrington, Christina Robinson, Preston Bailey, Valerie Cruz, Anne Ramsay, David Ramsey, Jerry Zatarain, Jeff Chase, Kristin Dattilo
